name: High Speed Hands
description:
High Speed Hands is a simple poker game that anyone can play. You will need fast fingers and an even faster mind to outwit your opponents. It’s the perfect way to practice your poker skills, train your mind, or simply pass the time.

Play against real people for free then switch to cash games when you're ready to compete and win!

How to play:

· Race to identify the highest ranked poker hand as quickly as possible.
· Each race features one community board and four possible hand choices – A, B, C and D.
· Identify the highest ranked hand in each race and you’ll be rewarded with a score multiplier.
· Compete against other players who play the 6 hands as you.

How fast are your fingers?

• Games can be played head to head with other players or in large multiplayer tournaments.
• In head to head games both players play the same set of hands.
• The player who finishes with the most points wins.
• Challenge players from around the world on Skillz, a competition platform complete with leaderboards, trophies, physical or virtual prizes, and an amazing loyalty program that rewards you for playing.
• Prize tournaments are available in about 75% of the world. Prize tournaments are not enabled in the following states: AZ, AR, CT, DE, FL, IN, LA, ME, MT, SC, SD, and TN. If you don't live in a real prize-enabled region, you can still play for fun with our virtual currency.

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to us at domiyesllc@gmail.com If you have any questions about the Skillz platform, please contact: support@skillz.com
